programme.title: TechStorm Originals
programme.desc: TechStorm Originals explores the latest upcoming gadgets, app reviews, interviews with tech startups and the hottest news from the tech and Esports scenes.

programme.title: Did You Know Ep.1
programme.desc: We will discover what our lives shall be like in 2030. What will our food look like by 2030? Discover the incredible food innovations that will fill our plates. You will know everything.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2013
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2013 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep.51
programme.desc: Dreadtrux Part 1 - After discovering a giant Dreadtrux Dinotrux hibernating inside a nearby mountain, Ty leads the Trux in a dangerous mission to save the crater

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep.11
programme.desc: Hit Or Myth In Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep.51
programme.desc: Not My Boy Brandon / Shady Shawn - Tip and Oh get an annoying "tagalong" friend who won't leave them alone/The Tucci's go camping with Lucy's new boyfriend

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep.10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep.6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep.25
programme.desc: Dang, I'M Rich! / Power Play - Cousin Ashley sets out to strike it rich and buy himself a mansion. Archibald explores Crackridge during a blackout with a new pal.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep.25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep.49
programme.desc: Get Lost - The gang get lost in the woods and stumble into a Land of Lost Things, where Gnasher gets “dognapped” by a Gnashersaurus Rex which has lost its beloved egg. To save Gnasher they have to rely on “Pieface Logic” to reunite the G-Rex with its egg, and thwart Walter’s ambition to make a record-breaking giant omelette...

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep.50
programme.desc: Call Of The Wild - Gnasher gets sent to Dog Obedience School after he inexplicably gnashes Mrs Creecher’s saxophone. When a Screwtop invention gives Dennis the ability to understand animals, he’s convinced the “Chatterbox” is Gnasher’s key to freedom. But all the talkative animals of Beanotown interrupt Dennis’ mission to speak to Gnasher and find out the truth...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep.77
programme.desc: The Moving Finger Writes - Puss and the gang attempt to find Sino for help to stop the earthquakes and end up on a dangerous journey to “The Forbidden Citadel”

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep.25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep.70
programme.desc: The Rival Racer - A swift new recruit joins the school racing team, putting Lucky's dreams of riding out front in jeopardy. Pru and Abigail clash over a class project.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep.51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/Bfff - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep.25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep.33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle'S - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;he’ll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle’s super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep.25
programme.desc: Coronation Of The Iron Goddess - When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep.77
programme.desc: King Of Dragons, Part 1 - The riders think they have discovered the King of Dragons but quickly learn along with the Flyers that the real King of the Dragons lives under Berserker Island

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep.1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: 3 Below: Tales Of Arcadia Ep.15
programme.desc: Moonlight Run - Two royal teenage aliens and their bodyguard flee a surprise takeover of their home planet by an evil dictator and crash land in Arcadia. Now on the run from intergalactic bounty hunters, they struggle to blend in and adapt to the bizarre world of high school all the while attempting to repair their ship so they can return and defend their home planet.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep.51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/Bfff - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep.45
programme.desc: Grosse Point Prank / Breaking Butt - To realize his dream of becoming a Bloogey Boy, Richie must out-prank Melvin. Audrey's sidelined after an injury but refuses to stop having fun.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.37
programme.desc: Rupert And The Invisible Foxes - The Fox Twins trick Raggety into turning them invisible with a magical glowing leaf so they can steal Rupert's picnic. When they're discovered Ping Pong tries to reverse the magic but inadvertently makes herself invisible too. Raggety is the only one who can help them but he's lost his magic leaf. Will Rupert and friends be able to find it before its glow finally vanishes and the Foxes and Ping Pong are forced to stay invisible for ever?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.38
programme.desc: Rupert And The Dew Fairy - Rupert and friends are asleep in a tent in Rupert's garden. Rupert wakes up very early to hear sounds outside. He finds Daisy the Dew Fairy, busy scattering dew in preparation for the arrival of the Dawn Chorus. She is very nervous as it's her first day doing the whole of Nutwood and she hopes to earn her golden wings that morning. But then she realises she has lost her dew bucket. Rupert offers to help her find it. Meanwhile, an early-rising Raggety comes across the strange shiny bucket and can't resist investigating. By the time Rupert and Daisy find him he has emptied all the dew out. Daisy is frantic – if she doesn't get Nutwood ready in time for the Dawn Chorus she will not earn her golden wings. Rupert persuades Raggety to do elf magic to replace the missing dew and the two of them help Daisy make up for lost time, spreading dew throughout the garden. But what is this Dawn Chorus Daisy talks of? They are in for a wonderful musical surprise when their work is complete.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.37
programme.desc: Making A Mountain Out Of A Molehill - Liam lets a misunderstanding about his upcoming “day surgery” escalate. Soon, the other students are sure his demise is inevitable and are treating him with kid gloves. As he enjoys the increased attention and sympathy, Birch becomes increasingly exasperated threatening to expose her cousin and his lies.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.38
programme.desc: Here'S Liam - With Birch's support Liam tries out at the teen open mike night at the local comedy club — and bombs. His chief Heckler, Raffi, gets invited back — as an act! The race to centre stage is on and Liam's not getting any traction, until he lets himself stumble, illuminating the physical side of his comedy.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep.89
programme.desc: Slugsy Won'T Slide - Slugsy has put too much slime on his slide and is terrified of sliding off it. Can the other tots help him overcome his fear?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep.90
programme.desc: Flowertot Taxi - Stingo is sure he is on to a good thing when he decides to start up a taxi service using… slug power! Slugsy is soon exhausted and unable to keep up with the demand

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep.37
programme.desc: Grizzly’S Great Outdoors - A snake bite causes Grizzly Griller to forget all his survival know-how, so it’s down to his greatest fan Dennis to help him re-learn his survival skills so they can all make it safely back to civilization.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep.38
programme.desc: Bertie’S Backbone - Dennis and the gang train Bertie in the art of standing up to people so he can rebel against Walter’s bossiness – but they train him too well and he becomes a dangerous rebel without a clue!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep.71
programme.desc: Genesis - Honerva sets her plans in motion on Oriande. The Voltron Coalition rushes to Oriande to intercept her before she succeeds.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep.21
programme.desc: Peabody'S Diet/Ponce De Leon - During a food-themed show, Peabody realizes he is out of shape but still just can't stop eating so it’s up to Sherman to help him lose weight

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep.19
programme.desc: Towaconstrictors - Revvit maps a path to a magical forest where the Dinotrux can explore and have fun, but once they arrive the crew is startled by Towaconstrictors

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep.26
programme.desc: Game Of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep.26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep.26
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 2 - After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must develop a plan to outwit this dangerous new enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep.34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a “No-Paperworkist” movement to avoid Buddy From HR’s constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep.26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part Ii - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep.71
programme.desc: Palentine'S Day - The PALs make plans for the Valentine's Day dance, then pivot to scare off a group of raiders who've come to rob the headmaster's vault.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep.26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep.2
programme.desc: Stuck/ Mozart - Peabody tries to play an Irish jig while trapped in the elevator; Mozart blows his big piano audition and lands everyone in jail.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep.26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep.26
programme.desc: Game Of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep.51
programme.desc: Why Meerkat Is Always On The Look Out - You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep.52
programme.desc: Why Cheetah Has Tears - You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep.51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfunny Clown - Noddy and his friends are having a “clown day” and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a ‘joke' goes too far. Using all his detecting skills and reconsidering evidence, Noddy works out that the unfunny clown is actually Fuse! He didn't realise that the clowning jokes he was playing on the other toys weren't actually funny! Noddy shows Fuse a way in which he can join in with the clowning in a safe way and Clown Day can go ahead after all. Well done Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep.52
programme.desc: Noddy And The Case Of The Raining Carrots - Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep.51
programme.desc: Why Are Acorns Buried Under The Tree? - Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know – Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question – yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep.52
programme.desc: How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird? - Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird – then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound – a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds – and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep.52
programme.desc: Dreadtrux Part 2 - Ty and D-Structs are forced to team up to defeat a common foe

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep.12
programme.desc: Venice The Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep.52
programme.desc: B.R.A.P. / It'S A Booviful Life - Oh is stuck in an alternate universe; Oh's new ranking as most respected Boov Rapper in Chicago is threatened

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep.12
programme.desc: Double - While Cleo and the gang try to find Octavians’s spy, a robot impersonates various people form the Academy.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep.7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep.26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.desc: Dennis And The Beanostalk: Part 1 - A massive Beanostalk transports all the Gang’s Christmas Stuff – and Gnasher – beyond the clouds to a Land of Giants! Dennis and the Gang bravely climb up to Ginormotown, determined to find Gnasher and bring Christmas back. On their quest they end up giving away all their christmas goodies, showing the Ginormotowners – and themselves what Christmas is really about!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep.46
programme.desc: Chevronica Mars / The Boy With The Dragon That Flew - It's Dot vs. Chevron in a cutthroat Mars simulation contest. A flying cybertronic dragon helps take Tiny to new heights.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.39
programme.desc: Rupert And The Apple River - Rupert and friends are going apple picking by the river. It's a hot day, so Ping Pong offers to magic up some fizzy apple drink for them all to drink afterwards. But her spell goes very wrong, sending giant apples rolling down into the river. Just as Rupert is suggesting Ping Pong try again they are all amazed to see Ming float by, surrounded by apply-bubbles. Ping Pong's giant magic apples have turned the river into a fizzy apple juice river, and the bubbles make you float. Soon Rupert and friends are having a great time, sucking in bubbles and floating about. But then Edward notices a problem. The apples are causing a log jam at the bridge and unless they can get them out, the river will flood. How will they get the river back to normal and prevent Nutwood being swept away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep.40
programme.desc: Rupert To The Rescue! - Freddy and Freda “borrow” Ping Pong's Magic Book and accidentally say a spell that makes their toy cupboard float off across Nutwood. Rupert takes charge of trying to stop the runaway item of furniture before it does any damage, trying to lasso it. But the Fox Twins meddle again, and Ping Pong gets tangled up in the lasso, ends up floating high in the sky, dangling from the flying cupboard! Things become even more serious when she floats out over the sea and gets stranded on a rock. Rupert has to make the Fox Twins face up to the trouble they've caused, and find a way to undo the magic.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.39
programme.desc: The Diary - Pod 4's plan to go to a movie gets derailed when Birch realizes she's “lost” her diary. Realizing it's in the office of The Cosmos Chronicle, Birch enlists the help of the others to intercept the newspaper before it gets distributed! The race is on to see if Birch can save herself from imminent disaster.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep.40
programme.desc: Raffi'S Secret Love - Eavesdropping, Birch misinterprets a conversation between her cousin and Raffi. She convinces herself that Raffi is in love with her justifying his increasingly odd behaviour as signs of his affection. By the time she finds out why he's scavenging for special labels, Birch has their entire future mapped out.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep.91
programme.desc: Fifi'S Happy Day - Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep.402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep.403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep.404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep.111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep.112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep.211
programme.desc: Blue's Rainy Day Rainbow - We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep.323
programme.desc: Pups Save the Gliding Turbots / Pups Save a Plane - Francois & Cap'n Turbot become stranded on a remote island,Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins. // It's a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodway's first flying lesson goes sideways,the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep.221
programme.desc: Pups Save Walinda - The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep.114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep.103
programme.desc: Catfish Capers / Bubble Debacle - Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan. // Sir Steel's attempts to clean up the Central Forest with a giant soap machine creates a huge bubble nightmare!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep.110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep.201
programme.desc: Paddington the Artist - Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep.603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep.604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep.115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep.107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep.605
programme.desc: The Holiday Parties! - In Holiday Land, there's a town for every holiday...that is, until Pirate Myra uses Wizard Grouper's magic wand to turn every town into Pirate Town! Will Molly and Gil be able to restore Holiday Land back to normal?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep.525
programme.desc: Escape from Volcano Island! - Skipper Molly and First Mate Gil are shipwrecked on Volcano Island, and it's about to erupt! But when parts of their boat start to mysteriously disappear, will they be able to make it off the island in time?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep.49
programme.desc: The Sailing Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they encounter the Penguins who explain they were on a very important mission when they got sick.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep.38
programme.desc: Caernarfon Castle, Wales - How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep.37
programme.desc: Mount Rushmore, USA - When the Grimbots add Glitch's face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2) Ep.4
programme.desc: The Hunt For The Golden Treat - Gladdy sets the Numpups a challenge: to outwit her security measures and crack the code to retrieve the Golden Treat.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep.106
programme.desc: Three - Laa‐Laa has fun counting to three; 1, 2, 3 rabbits, 1, 2, 3 flowers and 1, 2, 3 trees! Laa-Laa even counts three Teletubbies; Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep.11
programme.desc: Worm - Dee encourages a friend to say worm and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep.45
programme.desc: Get To Work - Time is money and it's taking a busy Business Po too long to get to work - can Team Tinpo speed up his commute?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep.6
programme.desc: It's time to bake - Gran Gran and JoJo are excited to bake a batch of Great Gran Gran's signature Saint Lucian banana bread, but there's a problem - they don't know how long to bake it for!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep.71
programme.desc: Honestly, Monty - Monty becomes nervous when he breaks Jeanie's project and doesn't know whether to tell her. He soon learns that you should always be honest.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep.70
programme.desc: Jimmy Jones Rules - Monty tries to tell his family that Jimmy is not just a toy, but much more. Whether they believe him is another story.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep.34
programme.desc: The Dump - On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep.5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep.4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep.3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep.42
programme.desc: Hong Kong, China - The Go Jetters spring into action when Glitch's mini-master toys invade Hong Kong Harbour.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep.41
programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep.33
programme.desc: Trampoline - When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep.32
programme.desc: Bumpy And The Wise Old Wolfhound - Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad sent her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus' quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1) Ep.11
programme.desc: Allosaurus and Dragonfly - Andy Day attempts to catch the breed of dragonfly that a baby Allosaurus hunts and eats, and watches as more hatch from their eggs and take their first step.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep.1

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S2) Ep.24

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep.2

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep.1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath and teach him a special song to help him learn how to brush his teeth.

programme.desc: 10 Minute Ticket / Clara Time - In an effort to avoid paying for parking, the whole family must try and keep a visit to the mall to less than 10 minutes. // Annie worries that their friend Clara is avoiding her and Pony.

programme.desc: Class Act / We're #1 - Detectives Grizzled and Partnur go undercover at City high school to catch a thief. // The Police vs Fire charity turns from good-natured to angry after competitive Tread Octane is brought in as a last minute replacement.

programme.desc: Wylde Wex / Business is Booming - Dr. Wexler helps his unfrozen best friend Wylde adjust to a modern, one-year-later world. // Tired of living with her overbearing mother, Daisy starts her own business in order to buy a dynamite factory as a new hideout.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep.421
programme.desc: The Littlest Robot - Simon invents a robot with emotions and an ability to learn which backfires when he's exposed to the internet.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep.422
programme.desc: You Troll - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep.422
programme.desc: Life of the Party - The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep.423
programme.desc: Sick as a Chipmunk - After caring for a sick Brittany, Eleanor and Jeanette wonder if Brittany would care for them if they were sick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep.163
programme.desc: Mermaidman Begins / Plankton's Good Eye - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret, heroic origins! // Using SpongeBob's DNA, Plantkon grows himself a second eye...and becomes nice!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep.215
programme.desc: Alien Zoo - When Danger Force becomes the newest exhibit at an Alien Zoo, Miles must find a way to break them out before they become alien dinner.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep.106
programme.desc: Cheater Cheater Cookie Eater - When Viv learns of Rachel's past failures as a Cookie Scout, she wishes they could enter the Mother-Daughter Competition together. Rachel's extreme tactics get them into trouble, but luckily Roy and Ty end up in the perfect position to bail them out.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep.112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep.419
programme.desc: Sister Act / House Flip - To get out of doing things they don't like, Lana and Lola secretly switch places and pretend to be the other. // After causing Flip to get hurt, the kids sneak him into the attic to care for him without Mom and Dad knowing.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep.101
programme.desc: Lost & Found Part 1 - Exiled on a mining colony outside Federation space, a group of lawless teens discover a derelict Starfleet ship.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep.266
programme.desc: Escape From Beneath Glove World - SpongeBob and Patrick are sent to jail in the underground tunnels of Glove World, leading to a daring escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep.160
programme.desc: Patrick's Staycation / Walking The Plankton - Patrick takes a break from the hustle and bustle of his daily life with some over-the-top pampering from SpongeBob. // When Karen and Plankton see Mr. Krabs on the same cruise, Plankton starts wondering who's minding the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep.112
programme.desc: They're All Named Reggie / The Same Ol' Same - After delivering mail in Purpleton, the gang finds a Baby Reggie stowaway that Parker insists on returning home. // When a famous Rapper visits the Mountain, Parker gives him a new zest for life.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep.515
programme.desc: Director's Rut / Friday Night Fights - Luan turns to Mr. Coconuts for help after she struggles to direct her school's play. // Lisa joins Lynn's football team as the analytics coach to prove that math will always beat out heart.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep.516
programme.desc: Grub Snub / She's All Bat - When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Gus's, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lola's newfound attention after she joins the Mortician's Club.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep.105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep.106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep.204
programme.desc: Pony Car / Wedding Planners - When Annie and her friends are invited to a fancy party, Pony decides they can't show up on foot and builds them a car. // Annie and Pony try to use Mom and Dad's marriage certificate to claim a free vacation, but realize the certificate is a fake!

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep.205
programme.desc: Cat Alley / Saving Horse - Annie tries to take a shortcut through an alley, but soon discovers that Pony's scared of the cats who live there. // When a vandalizer threatens Pony's favorite sculpture, Annie and Pony must find a way to stop her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep.210
programme.desc: Life Insurance / Burst Your Bubble - After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep.211
programme.desc: Plankton Retires / Trident Trouble - Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep.212
programme.desc: The Incredible Shrinking Sponge / Sportz? - SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after accidentally shrinking himself. // Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick for annoying him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep.213
programme.desc: The Getaway / Lost and Found - When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson. // When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep.111
programme.desc: Good Croc Bad Croc - After Po gets trapped in a hole, Fung helps him out and is owed a favor. Will it be a costly one?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep.112
programme.desc: Po Fans Out - To impress his fan club, Po releases the Mongolian Fist Demon. Now he has to figure out how to defeat the Demon and save the village and his fans!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep.113
programme.desc: The Blue Spirit - After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep.106
programme.desc: Two Feet High and Rising - Mort is kicked out of the lemur habitat after he touches King Julien's feet one too many times. So, the penguins take him in and attempt to break him of his foot obsession.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep.306
programme.desc: Antics on Ice / Showdown on Fairway 18 - The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skipper’s determined to take him as a treat. // A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep.307
programme.desc: King Me / Private and the Winky Factory - King Julien's archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. // Private's favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep.104
programme.desc: Rocket Trouble / The Brave and the Mold - Buckle up, duckies! The rocket van is about to get some sweet mods from ace-mechanic Ketta. // Mold strikes the bread mines, and the only ones who can strike back are TRUE Breadwinners.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep.110
programme.desc: Pictures of Boo - In need of shelter from a storm and desperately seeking sleep, the group of questers are welcomed into a mysterious house by a strange Colonel.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep.126
programme.desc: Dorg and the Magicals - As the Magicals track down an alien substance for RD, General Gratch and his scientists arrive in Normill, also on the hunt for something magical... // Time is running out for Dorg and the Magicals to find the rare Numpty Newt!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep.102
programme.desc: Catlantic City / Scaredy Cat - Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. // Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep.107
programme.desc: Muscle C.O.P.S. / Cold Hard Cash - Sanjay grows giant calf muscles and joins a peculiar police force. // Craig risks his life to help his best bud find a frozen treasure.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep.117
programme.desc: Ollie Doubles Down / The Great Grade Grab - Ollie convinces Van Horne to play him in detention so he can chase down and pack a garbage-eating blob monster. // When Bernie gets accepted to a gifted school, the trio decides to pull a heist and lower his grades.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep.102
programme.desc: The Janitor Strikes Back / Dollar Day - Fanboy and Chum Chum have a new best friend made of gum. // Fanboy and Chum Chum can't wait to spend their only dollar on two delicious Frosty Freezy Freezes.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep.103
programme.desc: Snapnapped / Mom-A-Geddon - Keswick is convinced by Snaptrap to build D.O.O.M. a new doomsday device, after he starts feeling that T.U.F.F. can't show empathy. // Dudley hasn't told his overprotective mother, Peg Puppy, that he is a T.U.F.F. super spy.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep.618
programme.desc: The Magic Totem - Flora faces off with Icy the Ice Queen to free Helia and escape the Legendarium World. But it doesn't end there - Icy left her frosty mark on Helia's heart. Can the Winx save Helia and Fearwood?

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep.619
programme.desc: Queen for a Day - The Winx are determined to enter Cloudtower and lock the Legendarium. But plans are halted when Cloudtower becomes invisible! Meanwhile, Stella is queen for the day, but the power - and the Legendarium - have gone to her head.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep.120
programme.desc: Mystic Library / The Purple Game - The Turtles plumb the depths of a mysterious hidden library in search of a way to rescue Mayhem. // A competitive new video game has swept New York and Donnie will do anything to reach rank number one.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep.226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep.227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep.228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep.229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep.142
programme.desc: Trenchbillies / Sponge-Cano - SpongeBob and Patrick fall into a cavern where frightful Trenchbillies keep them hostage. // Squidward's complaints trigger a volcanic eruption.

programme.title: UFC 279: Diaz vs Ferguson
programme.desc: Prelims - A welterweight showdown between two of UFC’s top stars headlines the Octagon’s return to T-Mobile Arena at UFC 279! In the main event, Stockton’s own Nate Diaz goes toe-to-toe with fellow action superstar Tony “El Cucuy” Ferguson in a battle of fan favorites. Plus, undefeated rising contender Khamzat “Borz” Chimaev battles Kevin “Trailblazer” Holland, and Li “The Leech” Jingliang takes on Daniel “D-Rod” Rodriguez.
